title: Flipped Learning-Based Digital Circuit Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental electrical and electronics theory and understanding of digital logic concepts
context.additional_context: Conducting integrated practical and theoretical education in a blended (face-to-face-online) environment.

learning_goals: Students can explain the basic components and operations of digital logic circuits.
Students can solve logic circuit design problems with over 90% accuracy based on flipped learning materials.
Students demonstrate the ability to implement digital systems using actual hardware simulation tools through group collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
